quoteAddedDescription: A new quote from {insurer} has been added.
createQuoteDescription: Create a new quote request to send to an insurance company
quotesRefreshedDescription: Quotes have been refreshed with latest information.
enterCoverageDetails: Enter details about coverage and benefits
optionalNotes: Optional notes for this quote request
reminderSentDescription: A reminder has been sent to the insurer.
quoteSentDescription: The quote has been sent to {insurer} for review.
quoteSelectedDescription: The quote has been selected as the preferred option.
quoteRejectedDescription: The quote has been marked as rejected.
quoteReceivedDescription: The quote response has been marked as received.
policyImportAvailable: Ready to import policy from this quote
salesProcessFinalizationNeeded: Finalize the sales process to import policy
finalizeProcessBeforeImport: Complete the sales process by moving it to the Concluded stage and changing status to Completed before importing the policy.
policyImportedSuccess: The policy has been successfully imported.
quoteReadyForImportDescription: This quote has been prepared for policy import
importPolicyFromQuoteDescription: Create a new policy based on the selected quote
selectedQuoteReadyForImport: Selected quote is ready to be imported as a policy
importStep1: Review the quote details and confirm they are correct
importStep2: Click 'Import Policy' to proceed to the policy import workflow
importStep3: Complete the policy import process by adding any additional required information
